Reference

All functions

add_buffer()

Add two buffers to a map

add_grid()

Add grid/buffer

colour_equipmenttype

Vector of custom colors for equipmenttype type classification

colour_range

Colours for scale_fill_gradientn() in "plot_station_horizon_range"

compute_class_air_temperature()

Compute siting class for a station measuring air temperature

compute_class_precipitation()

Compute siting class for a station measuring air temperature

compute_horizon()

Horizon height at a station

compute_horizon_max()

Maximum horizon height around a station

compute_horizon_rollmean()

Apply Hourly Rolling Mean to Horizon Height

compute_landtype()

Compute land cover types

compute_landtype_distance()

Compute distance distribution of landcover types

compute_landtype_horizon_class()

Pipeline to compute siting class

compute_skyviewfactor()

Sky View Factor (SVF)

compute_sun_position()

Sun position in the sky

download_dem_kartverket()

Download digital elevation models from Kartverket's WCS API

extract_resp()

Loop through request responses

fill_corine

Vector of CORINE land cover colors and types

fill_landtype

Vector of custom colors for land type classification

format_resp()

Extract and format JSON metadata

get_metadata_frost()

Get station and sensor metadata from Frost API

get_metadata_pagination()

Get station metadata/coordinates from Frost API

get_tile_wms()

Get Web Mapping Service data tiles

json_to_df()

Convert JSON to dataframe

make_bbox()

Construct boundary box

next_req()

Pagination protocol for API request

plot_dem_rayshader()

Plot digital surface/elevation model in 3D with shadow rendering

plot_landtype_dist()

Plot area-landtype distribution

plot_station_grid()

Plot station with Ortophoto, grid and buffers

plot_station_horizon_max()

Plot max horizon with sun height

plot_station_horizon_range()

Plot max horizon and range from the station

plot_station_horizon_sun()

Plot horizon with sun positions for a given station location

plot_station_siting_context()

Weather station context

plot_tile_station()

Plot station location with background WMS tiles

raster_to_vector()

Convert SpatRaster to SpatVector

stationid_array

Produce sun diagram and maps at the station

str_to_title()

String to Title format
